get.summary: Get a context provider by ID.

post.summary: Trigger a manual sync for a context provider.

get.summary: Get a contextual restriction by ID.

400.description: Invalid request or not a bucket data container
Invalid request or not a bucket data container

200.description: Get presigned upload URL for archive import

400.description: Invalid request or not a bucket data container

200.description: List zip operations for data container

404.description: Data container or zip operation not found

parameters.name: expires_in
parameters.description: URL expiration time in seconds (default: 3600, max: 86400)

200.description: Get presigned download URL for the archive

400.description: Archive operation is not completed or not an export

404.description: Data container or archive operation not found

200.description: List all data docks in a harbor

get.summary: List all user attributes for an organization.
get.description:
Returns all users and their attributes for the specified organization.
This is useful for administrative views showing all user access configurations.
Only organization viewers and above can access this endpoint.

200.description: All user attributes in the organization
List all users in an organization

201.description: User added to the organization successfully

409.description: User already exists in the organization

204.description: User removed from the organization successfully

get.summary: List all attributes for a user in an organization.
get.description:
Returns all RLS attributes assigned to the user in the specified organization.
Attributes are in `namespace::value` format (e.g., `region::occitanie`).

put.summary: Set all attributes for a user (replaces existing).
put.description:
Replaces all existing attributes for the user with the provided list.
All attributes must be in valid `namespace::value` format.
Only organization owners can perform this operation.

post.summary: Add a single attribute to a user.
post.description:
Adds a new attribute to the user's existing attributes.
The attribute must be in valid `namespace::value` format.
If the attribute already exists, this is a no-op.
Only organization owners can perform this operation.

delete.summary: Remove a single attribute from a user.
delete.description:
Removes the specified attribute from the user.
The attribute path parameter must be URL-encoded (e.g., `region%3A%3Aoccitanie`).
Only organization owners can perform this operation.

get.summary: List context providers for an organization.
List contextual restrictions for an organization.

403.description: User not authorized to refresh data docks in this organization

get.summary: Get effective security settings (org + datadock combined).

AddUserAttributeRequest.description: Request to add a single attribute to a user.

destination_data_container_id.description: The bucket where the zip file is stored

file_path.description: The full path to the uploaded file (from prepare_archive_import response)

prefix.description: Optional prefix where files will be extracted in the target bucket

data_container_id.description: The data container to import to/export from

destination_data_container_id.description:
The data container where the files will be extracted to when importing
or where the files will be extracted from when exporting

file_name.description: The name of the archive file

file_path.description: The path of the archive file

file_size.description: The size of the archive file

prefix.description:
If the operation is an import, the prefix to add to all files when extracting the archive
If the operation is an export, the prefix to filter which files to include in the export (only files matching this prefix will be exported)

CreateContextProviderBody.description: Request to create a context provider.

config.description: Configuration JSON based on provider type

CreateContextualRestrictionBody.description: Request to create a contextual restriction.

console_base_domain.description: The base domain for the console (e.g., "localhost" for dev, "hyperfluid.app" for prod).

Harbor.description:
A harbor is a collection of [DataDocks](super::datadock::Datadock)
Each harbor belongs to an [Org](super::org::Org)
Each harbor has an owner who is a [User](super::user::User)

ListContextProvidersResponse.description: Response for list of context providers.

ListContextualRestrictionsResponse.description: Response for list of contextual restrictions.

ListUserAttributesResponse.description: Response containing a list of user attributes.

Org.description: An organization is a collection of [Users](super::user::User) and [DataDocks](super::datadock::DataDock)

OrgUserAttributesResponse.description: Response for organization-wide user attributes (grouped by user).

users.description: Map of user_id to their attributes.

ParsedAttributeResponse.description: Parsed attribute with separate namespace and value.

instances.description: Number of PostgreSQL instances (1=standalone, 2+=HA with replicas)

destination_data_container_id.description: The bucket where the zip file will be uploaded

destination_file_name.description: The name of the zip file

destination_file_path.description: Where the zip file will be stored in the bucket (optional path)

iam_sa_client_id.description: The client_id of the Keycloak client.

iam_sa_credentials_path.description: The secret path in the secret store for the service account credentials.

iam_sa_id.description: This is the storage ID of the Keycloak client NOT the client_id.

SetUserAttributesRequest.description: Request to set all attributes for a user (replaces existing).

attributes.description:
List of attributes in `namespace::value` format.
Example: `["region::occitanie", "department::sales"]`

UpdateContextProviderBody.description: Request to update a context provider.

UpdateContextualRestrictionBody.description: Request to update a contextual restriction.

UpdateDataDockSecuritySettingsBody.description: Request to update datadock security settings.

UpdateOrgSecuritySettingsBody.description: Request to update organization security settings.

UserAttributesEntry.description: Entry for a single user's attributes.

attribute_sources.description: Maps attribute names to the provider name that supplied them.

tags.name: User Attributes
tags.description: User attributes management for Row-Level Security (RLS)
